text.author: Fake A. Ccount, David James, Dave Crosby and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Cope With a Double Parachute Failure
text.summary: This double parachute failure guide advises remaining calm, alerting fellow jumpers by waving your arms and linking arms with them through their harness, prepare for chute deployment shock and impact and steering away from powerlines and towards water (or in a solo jump, attempting to open the reserve chute or else praying).
